Package net.apartium.cocoabeans.space

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
net.apartium.cocoabeans.space.Transform
@AvailableSince("0.0.30") public class Transform extends Object
Represents a transform in 3D space, combining position and rotation
See Also:

  • Rotation
